page.title: 08MODERN DAY FARMING
page.content: Agriculture is probably the most efficient industry in the British Isles,although over_production has caused surpluses in grain,milk,beef, butter & sugar.Huge 12'_20' combine harvesters,multifurrow ploughs & 40' sprays are now in use.Only the larger estates employ workers,most are family run farms.The last local farm worker became redundant recently. What a wonderful job plant breeders have done with modern technology. We have arrived at the computer age with milk recording, pig live weight gain per kilo meal & beef fattening.This is all,I guess,for the young generation. With roadside sales & Pick Your Own maybe the only thing elderly farmers can do is sit back & say{"Thanks for {the memory". }
